title: (美國) 反共議員: 美國政府輸給「中共」, 但打擊了伊朗

replies.msg:
美國共和黨的著名反中共議員Marco Rubio指他支持美國政府廢除伊朗核協議, 更支持美國政府打擊委內瑞拉假選舉.

但同時間, Marco Rubio表示在中美談判上, 美國政府已正在輸給「中共」, 更認為美國政府對待中興的手法是一成不變.

http://twitter.com/marcorubio/status/998882380957081600

Marco Rubio
@marcorubio
15小時15 小時前
The end of terrible #IranDeal & quick & decisive response to fake election in #Venezuela is testament to the fact that with @SecPompeo @stevenmnuchin1 & @AmbJohnBolton in place, @POTUS now has a team that will execute, not block, his orders on foreign policy.

http://twitter.com/marcorubio/status/998875240016039936

Marco Rubio
@marcorubio
15小時15 小時前
更多
Here is #ZTE timeline: Violated U.S. sanction laws & got caught lying & covering up. Paid $1billion fine & agreed to discipline employees. But then lied again & instead of discipline gave those employees bonuses. Now we are offering same deal of fine & employee discipline?

http://twitter.com/marcorubio/status/998869936599650304

Marco Rubio
@marcorubio
16小時16 小時前
Sadly #China is out-negotiating the administration & winning the trade talks right now. They have avoided tariffs & got a #ZTE deal without giving up anything meaningful in return by using N.Korea talks & agriculture issues as leverage. This is #NotWinning
Marco Rubio係長期反共者, 值得多D尊重
